newsitem.title: USA: Wells Fargo names two new vice chairmen.
newsitem.headline: Wells Fargo names two new vice chairmen.

text.p: Wells Fargo and Co said Joseph Stiglich, executive vice president and head of physical distribution, and David Hoyt, executive vice president of capital markets group, were promoted to vice chairmen.
Stiglich is responsible for 1,984 traditional branches, including 750 supermarket branches. He joined Wells Fargo in 1971.
Hoyt heads the Capital Markets Group, a position he has held since 1994. With his promotion he will head the real Estate Group and International Group as well.
